The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 15 October is 4,242 (491 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 October, there were 368 new confirmed cases (42.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 October, there were 286 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 29% ( 82 extra cases).
